features: CETAPHIL GENTLE OIL-FREE MAKEUP REMOVER: Gently removes waterproof and long-wear makeup to leave skin feeling clean and refreshed
DERMATOLOGIST- & OPHTHALMOLOGIST-TESTED: Effectively removes waterproof mascara from delicate eye area without irritation or oily residue
SOOTHING BOTANICALS: Formulated with aloe vera, ginseng and green tea
SUITABLE FOR SENSITIVE SKIN: Fragrance free, oil free, non-irritating & noncomedogenic
DESIGNED FOR SENSITIVE SKIN: All CETAPHIL products are effective yet non-irritating
body.description: This oil free, bi-phase liquid gently and effectively dissolves makeup, oil and impurities, leaving face feeling smooth, clean and refreshed. Suitable for all skin types, even sensitive skin.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This gentle, fragrance-free makeup remover can be used all over the entire face, including the delicate eye area. Tested by dermatologists and ophthalmologists, this makeup remover liquid is hypoallergenic and noncomedogenic, so it won’t clog pores or irritate sensitive skin. Formulated with aloe vera, ginseng, and green tea, this makeup remover provides a soothing cleansing experience and removes makeup without drying skin or leaving behind an oily residue. CETAPHIL Gentle Oil-Free Makeup Remover is a bi-phase liquid formula that, when shaken, activates the hydrophilic (water-based) and hydrophobic (silicone-based) ingredients to effortlessly dissolve even the most stubborn makeup without leaving a greasy residue. Gentle enough for use all over the face, this liquid makeup remover leaves skin feeling soft and nourished.

Biggest benefits: CETAPHIL is a Dermatologist Recommended Sensitive Skincare Brand used around the world by millions of people with sensitive skin. CETAPHIL cleansers effectively yet gently clean without stripping or leaving skin feeling dry and tight. CETAPHIL skincare products are developed with and clinically tested by dermatologists. *Based on an independent clinical study

Bi-phase formula effortlessly dissolves stubborn makeup Before you break out your regular cleanser, ensure you’ve removed all makeup from your skin—particularly if you wear waterproof or long-wear makeup. Begin by shaking CETAPHIL Gentle Oil-Free Makeup Remover to activate its bi-phase formula, and apply liberally to cotton ball/pad. Wash with a gentle, effective cleanser morning and night For a deeper clean, follow with CETAPHIL Gentle Skin Cleanser, which hydrates and removes excess oil, dirt and impurities Immediately follow with a facial moisturizer to lock in hydration After cleansing, follow with a moisturizer to help replenish the skin’s natural moisture barrier and lock in long-lasting hydration. This step helps to nourish and protects the skin from dryness. During the day, choose a moisturizer that also offers SPF protection, like CETAPHIL Daily Facial Moisturizer SPF 15. At night, apply CETAPHIL Rich Hydrating Cream to nourish skin and strengthen its natural moisture barrier. Complete your sensitive skin care routine with CETAPHIL A daily routine with CETAPHIL cleansers and moisturizers, designed for your skin type, will help your skin feel clean, refreshed and comfortably hydrated. Try CETAPHIL Gentle Oil-Free Makeup Remover, Gentle Skin Cleanser and Daily Facial Moisturizer SPF 15 as part of your gentle skin care routine.

Gentle Oil Free Makeup Remover Gentle Skin Cleanser Daily Facial Moisturizer SPF 15 Rich Hydrating Cream Hydrating Eye Gel Cream Skincare benefit Oil-free, bi-phase formula effortlessly removes stubborn makeup Gentle face wash that cleanses, hydrates and soothes skin Lightweight, oil-free lotion with SPF 15 hydrates while protecting skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays Quick absorbing and non-greasy cream nourishes and rehydrates skin Unique gel-cream quickly absorbs to hydrate, brighten and smooth under eye area Skin type Sensitive skin/All skin types Dry to normal skin Sensitive skin/ Dry to normal skin Sensitive skin/ Dry to normal skin Sensitive skin/All skin types Key ingredients Aloe vera, ginseng, green tea pH balanced, soap free Avobenzone 3%, octocrylene 10% and glycerin Hyaluronic acid, vitamin E, vitamin C and olive extract Hyaluronic acid, vitamin E, green tea extract and licorice root extract Hypoallergenic ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Won't clog pores (Noncomedogenic) ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Fragrance free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve tried so many different brands of makeup remover sheets, and these are the best by far! The cloths are sturdy, and extra large. They easily remove every bit of makeup. And after I use them, my skin feels soft and moisturized, not dry and stripped like after other products. I will never use another brand again. I’m now a huge fan of Cetaphil!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best makeup remover on the market!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this product though it is hard to find in the stores. Luckily Amazon always gets it to you in a pinch. My only concern lately is that Amazon is sending it with these huge stickers on it and when you remove them the product is very sticky. I have spilled the contents many times when my fingers stick to the bottle! AHHHHH! It is well worth it though as it seamlessly takes off makeup and leaves your skin feeling great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Worked really well. Used them to freshen up and it took off a lot of dirt. Also pretty moisturizing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars works but leaves 'greasy' feeling
reviews.reviewText: I have sensitive eyes and was looking for something that would take what little makeup I wear (a little eyeliner, mascara, brow pencil) off easily, no scrubbing, & with no irritation. After reading multiple reviews, I chose the Cetaphil.I have used this for many days (3 blurps on a cotton pad) and this is what I have noticed. 1] to remove ALL of the neutrogena mascara, I either have to hold the pad on my eye to let the mascara 'soak' or I resort to light scrubbing. 2] more product on the cotton pad doesn't help remove anything any better 3] Even though this is oil-free, there is an 'oily' feeling that is left around my eyes. It does not matter how much or little product is used. 4] rinsing my face with water after, as the directions state, doesn't take away that feeling. 5] this caused some of the skin around my eye to feel irritated and slightly red.Conclusion: a] does remove makeup, but seems to not do well with mascara b] have to wash my face after using to remove oily feeling c] somewhat irritating to skin. I can use this, just not everyday. You may have different results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is non-comdeogenic
reviews.reviewText: The description on the amazon page said that it was non-comedogenic, but the package did not. Of course, I didn't find this out until after I received the package. I went to Cetaphil's website and that said it was non comedogenic, so I took a chance and used it. I like to use wipes when I travel. It is so much more convenient. These worked well and my face did not break out, so it appears that it really is non comedogenic. It also made my skin soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle, non perfumey
reviews.reviewText: This is a gentle cleanser! I have fairly sensitive skin, and struggle to use makeup removers. I use this as a substitute for washing my face when I’m out of the house. The smell isn’t perfumey, which I appreciate. It doesn’t smell like medicine, either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Removes all makeup
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use. Does the job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pros and cons
reviews.reviewText: I like that this product is convenient to throw into a travel bag, gym bag or larger purse. They’re larger than other wipes I’ve used, which is nice! They did not cause me to break out or burn my sensitive skin. It doesn’t remove a full face of makeup for me but it is good for removing mascara and eye makeup without burning my eyes. I found that I can’t use it alone to remove a full face of makeup and still have to wash my face after but they’re convenient and remove enough to use quickly to get most makeup off if you’re in a hurry or exhausted and just want to get to sleep haha. However, there is still some makeup residue on my skin after use unless I use several wipes. They do tend to dry my skin a little bit so I have to moisturize a little extra after use. They’d be great to use after the gym to wipe off sweat or first thing in the morning for a quick clean before makeup. While a little drying for me, if you don’t struggle with extremely dry skin you might not have a problem with that. That being said, even though it was drying it didn’t irritate or cause issues as long as I moisturized really good after. They’re great to cleanse face for reasons other than makeup unless you only have a little on. I have used them on my 6yo daughter once or twice to get her makeup off when she’s been playing with it, and there was no burning or irritation. They are effective at removing lipstick. (Or stray lipstick on a little girl who can’t quite keep it on her lips).

reviews.reviewTitle: Desmaquilla rapidamente rimel contra agua y no irrita mis ojos.
reviews.reviewText: Siempre uso rimel contra agua y generalmente los desmaquillantes de ojos me irritan, sin embargo, este producto de Cetaphil resulto maravilloso: retira el rimel de mis ojos con 2 pasadas, con poco producto; y lo más importante no irrita mis ojos.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have super sensitive skin, especially on my eye lids, and I’ve found this make up remover to be the best for my delicate skin. Also, it removes even the toughest of long lasting eye liner. I highly recommend!

He probado muchos desmaquillantes bifásicos y este ha sido, por mucho, el mejor que he probado. Tengo la piel muy sensible y uso máscara de pestañas waterproof , este desmaquillarte me retira muy fácil la máscara de pestañas waterproof y deja mi piel sin irritarme, me encanta.
I’ve been using this makeup remover for years now. It doesn’t dry out my skin, it’s perfect for my sensitive skin & does not have a scent! I definitely recommend this makeup remover.
